title: The Hottest Takes
description: On our final show, the Hot Takedown crew breaks down what we've learned and says farewell with a Hall of Fame hot take.
itunes:title: The Hottest Takes
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
itunes:subtitle: On our final show, the Hot Takedown crew breaks down what we've learned and says farewell with a Hall of Fame hot take.
